content:encoded:
Relic Radio Science Fiction features a story from Tales Of Tomorrow this week. From February 19, 1953, here’s their story, Watch Bird.

Relic Radio is made possible by your support, and has been for 15 years. If you are able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thanks again to all who have supported us over the years!
